mapper.select:
select count(*) from hdg_battery_format
and cell_model LIKE concat('%', #{cellModel}, '%')
and cell_mfr LIKE concat('%', #{cellMfr}, '%')

select * from hdg_battery_format
and cell_model LIKE concat('%', #{cellModel}, '%')
and cell_mfr LIKE concat('%', #{cellMfr}, '%')
order by id desc limit #{beginIndex}, #{rows}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hdg_battery_format( cell_model_id, cell_mfr, cell_model, battery_format_name, nominal_pow, nominal_cap, min_nominal_cap, max_nominal_cap, ac_resistance, min_ac_resistance, max_ac_resistance, resilience_vol, min_resilience_vol, max_resilience_vol, static_vol, min_static_vol, max_static_vol, circle, min_circle, max_circle, barcode_rule, cell_count, memo, operator, create_time ) VALUES ( #{cellModelId}, #{cellMfr}, #{cellModel}, #{batteryFormatName}, #{nominalPow}, #{nominalCap}, #{minNominalCap}, #{maxNominalCap}, #{acResistance}, #{minAcResistance}, #{maxAcResistance}, #{resilienceVol}, #{minResilienceVol}, #{maxResilienceVol}, #{staticVol}, #{minStaticVol}, #{maxStaticVol}, #{circle}, #{minCircle}, #{maxCircle}, #{barcodeRule}, #{cellCount}, #{memo}, #{operator}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: update hdg_battery_format set cell_model_id = #{cellModelId}, cell_mfr = #{cellMfr}, cell_model = #{cellModel}, battery_format_name = #{batteryFormatName}, nominal_pow = #{nominalPow}, nominal_cap = #{nominalCap}, min_nominal_cap = #{minNominalCap}, max_nominal_cap = #{maxNominalCap}, ac_resistance = #{acResistance}, min_ac_resistance = #{minAcResistance}, max_ac_resistance = #{maxAcResistance}, resilience_vol = #{resilienceVol}, min_resilience_vol = #{minResilienceVol}, max_resilience_vol = #{maxResilienceVol}, static_vol = #{staticVol}, min_static_vol = #{minStaticVol}, max_static_vol = #{maxStaticVol}, circle = #{circle}, min_circle = #{minCircle}, max_circle = #{maxCircle}, barcode_rule = #{barcodeRule}, cell_count = #{cellCount}, memo = #{memo}, operator = #{operator} where id = #{id}
